DriverRegistrationPage.description: Earn up to 1901 zł per week by driving with BoltCopy
DriverRegistrationPage.secondaryDescription: Become a BoltCopy driver, set your schedule and earn money by driving!

DriverRegistrationPageHeadSection.title: Join BoltCopy as a driver – earn whenever you want
DriverRegistrationPageHeadSection.description: Become a driver with BoltCopy and start earning! Flexible working hours, attractive earnings, easy registration. Apply now and drive on your own terms!
DriverRegistrationPageHeadSection.keywords: driver jobs, earning as a driver, transport app, join as a driver, flexible work, full-time driver jobs, part-time driver jobs, driver recruitment

DriverRegistrationCompletePage.description: Turn the key to adventure and profits with BoltCopy
DriverRegistrationCompletePage.secondaryDescription: Join the ranks of satisfied BoltCopy drivers! Choose work hours that suit you and earn money by meeting travelers needs!

DriverRegistrationCompletePageHeadSectio.title: The final step to earning with BoltCopy!

DriverLoginPageHeadSection.title: Log in and start driving with BoltCopy!
DriverLoginPageHeadSection.description: Access your account and take control of your rides. Drive on your schedule, earn on your terms, and enjoy the freedom of being a BoltCopy driver. Log in now and hit the road!

DriverLoginPage.description: Log in to start earning with BoltCopy today!
DriverLoginPage.secondaryDescription: Access your driver account, manage your rides, and maximize your earnings on your own schedule.

AddCarPageHeadSection.title: Add your car to BoltCopy – Get ready to drive

ClientLoginPageHeadSection.title: Log in and ride with BoltCopy!
